Fixed Lineup Stages
Features stages with pre-set units, Cat Cannon
settings, and Treasures. Tap the
button below to check your units!

View a hint before the start of battle
for stages with fixed lineups!
Tap the stage button to see it!

Tap the icon to show more info!
You can check enemies, one-time rewards,
and other important bits of info!

You must use a fixed lineup in this stage.
The formation cannot be changed.
※View formation details at the pause menu.

There are many types of enemies including
Red, Black, and Alien enemies.
For Red enemies, Axe Cat and
Fish Cat are effective.

Against ranged attacker Teacher Bear,
use Long-range units like Lizard Cat.
Versus hard-hitting enemies like Le'boin,
tough units like Titan Cat are the answer.
Leverage a Cat Unit's strengths to win!

Machine-like Metal enemies
take very little damage.
To deal with them, deploy units with the
Critical ability.

Purple Zombie enemies
can revive even after being defeated.
Zombie Killer units can defeat
Zombies and keep them from reviving.

Speedy and relentless enemies
can be held back by deploying
Units that are low-cost
and have high Vitality.

Some bosses will not appear until
the enemy base is attacked.
Make sure to stock up on money before
punching through the enemy's forces.

Debuffs like Freeze and Slow
are an effective solution
to Traited enemies.
Use units with debuffs that counter
Traited enemies to win!

Some enemies have damage-nullifying
Barriers. These can be destroyed with
either a powerful attack or by a Unit
with the Barrier Breaker ability.

Zombies will burrow underground
when near a Cat unit.
Counter this maneuver by pacing
unit deployment accordingly.

【Deploy Limit】
A maximum of 60 units
can be deployed.
